comment: It's okay I guess, the location works fine

Absolutely amazing hostel! Best experience in Pune! Staff was incredibly helpful and friendly!

I think it's acceptable, the WiFi works
Outstanding! Perfect location near Mumbai railway station, clean rooms, great vibe!

Best hostel in Maharashtra! Clean, safe, friendly atmosphere, highly recommend!
